channel.title: Retro on instantiator.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Retro on instantiator.dev

item.title: 8-bit Supercomputer
item.description: It took me 3 weeks to complete the day 11 puzzle for Advent of Code on a BBC Micro this year, and you’d be hard pressed to describe my solution as “proportionate” or “necessary”…

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: I learned to code on a computer called the BBC Micro, released by the BBC in 1981. I was also released in 1981, and I have a bit of a bond with these 8-bit wonders.

item.title: Wriggler
item.description:
This is a necropost, resurrected from an old blog.

Wriggler

It was 1998 and I was 17. My tool of choice was QBasic and this is a game I wrote based on a concept I stole from another game called Wriggler.
